title: Master Algebra Fundamentals
shortDescription: Build a solid foundation in algebraic thinking
longDescription: Complete a structured path covering variables, equations, functions, and problem-solving strategies using free resources from Khan Academy and OpenStax.

steps.title: Introduction to Variables
steps.description: Learn what variables are and how they represent unknown values

steps.title: Understanding Functions
steps.description: Explore the concept of functions and their graphs

title: Create Your First Student Budget
shortDescription: Track expenses and plan for the essentials
longDescription: Set up a realistic budget covering fixed costs, variable expenses, and savings goals using simple templates and money-saving strategies.

steps.title: List Your Fixed Costs
steps.description: Write down rent, fees, transport, and other regular expenses

steps.title: Track Variable Spending
steps.description: Monitor food, entertainment, and flexible costs for one week

steps.title: Set One Savings Goal
steps.description: Decide on a small, achievable monthly savings target

title: Build a Sustainable Sleep Routine
shortDescription: Improve your rest and energy levels
longDescription: Design a sleep schedule that fits your life, using evidence-based tips and tools like Sleepyti.me.

steps.title: Learn About Sleep Cycles
steps.description: Understand REM and non-REM sleep phases

steps.title: Calculate Your Ideal Bedtime
steps.description: Use sleep cycle calculator to find optimal sleep and wake times

steps.title: Test Your Routine for 7 Days
steps.description: Stick to your new schedule and journal how you feel
